quote.author: - Ban Ki-Moon, UN Secretary-General
quote.body: ‘Energy is the golden thread that connects economic growth, increased social equity, and an environment that allows the world to thrive.’

metrics.valueDescription: Ghanian energy comes from renewable resources
Citizens of Ghana currently have energy insecurities
